ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Gordon finally responds
ygData.msgSnippet: That option, while a nightmare, would still be better than losing 1000+ pp items due to the lousy interface. ... From:  To:
ygData.messageBody:
That option, while a nightmare, would still be better than losing 1000+ pp
items due to the lousy interface.
